title: 24 Feet 1/2-Inch Natural Gas Hose with Quick Connect Fitting for BBQ, Grill, Pizza Oven, Patio Heater and More NG Appliance, Propane to Natural Gas Conversion Kit - CSA Certified
features: 【Good quality】Material upgrade - The propane hose is made of high-quality rubber, And connected with 100% solid brass connector, Has very good weather resistance, It is anti-cracking, anti-rust and very durable, Comply with CSA certification
【Widely used】Has a very broad applicability, Perfect for Weber, Charbroil Grill, and more NG appliances, The hose kit is used to connect your natural gas grill to the natural gas supply
【Easy to Install】Very easy to use and flexible, With quick-disconnect brass fittings on both ends, it is easy to attach and remove this gas hose as needed

【Greater capacity】24FT 1/2 inch ID Natural Gas Hose - with 1/2 inch quick disconnect/connect plug x 1/2 inch bell mouth fittings, Supplies up to 135,000 BTU P/HR, provide adequate gas flow for grills and other gas appliance

【Quality after-sales】1 Year quality guarantee, If you have any questions or needs during the use of our natural gas conversion kit, you can email me at any time and I will give you the best answer. You do not have to bear any losses
description: 1.We have upgraded the materials of hoses and accessories, The propane hose is made of high-quality rubber, And connected with 100% solid brass connector, Has very good weather resistance, And anti-aging, Anti-rupture, Anti-rust, Comply with CSA certification, More durable than normal propane hose, safer
2.Three sizes to choose from, there is always a length that suits you, The grill can be used at a safe distance. Give you a free, flexible and safe experience
3.Airtight tape we give away, Can guarantee good air tightness, Safer, rest assured
1* (12FT / 24FT / 36FT）1/2" ID natural gas hose and fitting assembly

This natural gas conversion kit is additionally equipped with a 3/8" Female Flare by 1/2" Male Flare Adapter, which can be converted to a 3/8-inch connector gas grill, flexible conversion, more widely adapted to your need
